actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam.

summary.text: Provides that the District Court of Guam shall have jurisdiction over claims against the United States based upon the alleged failure to pay just compensation for property acquired from claimants prior to August 1, 1950, by the United States. (Adds 48 U.S.C. 1424(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam.
